long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The FocusTube Extension caters to users who use YouTube for educational purposes by providing a distraction-free viewing experience. It effectively removes distractions such as comments and recommendations from the video view page.
